name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: House Minority Leader Nancy Pelosi says she has dirt on Newt Gingrich, but so far she's keeping her lips sealed — because that's how the last surgeon left them.

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: Olive Garden announced they're undergoing a makeover to try to increase business. They're so desperate they're even considering serving Italian food.

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: A new website just came out that’s designed to calculate how long it takes Mitt Romney to earn your salary. So from now on, whenever Mitt Romney is running late, he can call there and say, “I'll be there in five teachers.”

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: What's interesting is in the time it took you to think about that joke, Mitt Romney made $65 million.

name: Jimmy Kimmel
monologue: President Obama gave his annual State of the Union address last night in Washington, D.C. Did the Supreme Court justices really need to wear their robes to that?

name: Jimmy Kimmel
monologue: There's a new episode of "American Idol" on tonight. Tonight's auditions were held in aspen. Where else better to find talent than a snowbound town that's 400 miles by icy road to the nearest city?

name: Jimmy Kimmel
monologue: Facebook users probably know, in September, the site unveiled the Facebook profile page, which they call "timeline." Or more fittingly, "waste of timeline."

name: Jimmy Kimmel
monologue: It's revolutionary because it allows your friends and co-workers to see drunken photographs of you, not just from last night, but from any point in your existence.
